message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by both you and others. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $9,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to acquire it without compromising on value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
